description: Celer liquidity pool-based bridge for cross-chain token transfers with slippage control, supporting both ERC20 and native tokens with delayed transfer protection

Pyth upgradeable price oracle contract providing stable price feeds through Hermes Stable, with cross-chain price updates via Wormhole

Symbiosis MetaRouter contract for cross-chain token swaps, supporting multi-step routing through various DEXs with unified gateway approval system
Symbiosis Portal contract for cross-chain token bridging via synthetic assets, supporting token synthesis/burning, meta-transactions, and emergency revert functionality
Relay message receiver contract for handling cross-chain message delivery and execution with verification
Relay ERC20Router contract for managing cross-chain ERC20 token transfers and routing
Relay ApprovalProxy contract for managing token approvals and permissions in cross-chain operations

iZumi WG-WETH Algebra V1.9 pool with dynamic fees, concentrated liquidity, and advanced price oracle integration
